item.title: RMarkdown to Github Pages
item.description: RMarkdown into Github Pages Example of one of my Github pages: You might have read this GitHub and RStudio tutorial by searching this topic. It is quite long and confusing as it tries to teach Git at the same time. You donâ€™t need any of those branch operations. And the example yaml code is not indented correctly (corrected below). Here is the short version: Create in the root directory a yaml file: "
